column4: so, I wanted to go cut down the time-delay in grub from 8 seconds to 1 or 2 seconds, but when I went to /boot/grub, I couldn't find the usual grub.conf (although a heck of a lot o other files). I take it that things have changed
when did we move to grub2 from grub1?
You better do not do it in the near future.
